ROM.Changelog:
Rom Changelogs:- • September Security Patches (8.1.0_r46). • Fixed DND Tile. • Fixed Screenshot Delete in notifications. • Allow using 4G icon instead LTE in Statusbar. • Fixed VPN status dialog. • Fixed Maintainers URL fetching issue. • Updated few Apns. • Added support for Snapdragon 845 devices. • Added Call Recording Feature. • Added Phone Number Lookup feature. • Added Auto record feature in dailer. • Added Call statistics. • Some dailer app Improvements. • Added Alarm Blocker. • Added Smart Pixels feature. • Added Pocket Mode. • UI/UX improvements. • Carrier Signal Improvements. • Performance improvement and bug fixes. • New icon for Recorder. • Misc fixes and Under the hood improvements. • Check Github and Gerrit for More information.
Device Specific:- • Lattest Derp kernel. • Added Xthermal fast charge v4. • Added MIUI cam.
